lines.text: To the game and getting out of this hick town! Thank God there is a sport for middle-sized white boys.
The only thing better than a glass of beer, is tea with Miss McGill!
Where else could I get beaten up every day, treated like shit by prima donna Canadians, get my nuts shaved?
You can learn to punch in the barn, but you gotta learn to survive on the ice.
The guy suckered me.
get ready for the right hook.
Don't take any shit from them Canucks. To them, you're just another wetback, crossing the border to play their game.
They'll never catch me!
Oh, they'll catch you.
You know what Gordie Howe got for a signing bonus? A team jacket!

[under his breath]
Lousy agent.

[walks into barn and sees Dean standing in front of a punching bag]
Just hit it, pillowhands. Don't worry, it's not gonna hit you back.
Stay on sides, Youngblood.
Pass the puck!
Don't tell me when to pass the puck.
You want me to slow down for ya?

All right, one period left. One period away from winning it all or losing to these miserable hackers with their shit-eating grins and their Saturday night wrestling tactics. One period away from remembering something for the rest of your life or something you wanna forget.
Hey, go hump your Saint Bernard, scum-nuts.
I think all hockey players should know how to read and write.
Where'd you get these guys from, Ray? Mexico.
We're only looking for one player.
Like that sorry son of a bitch who just tripped over the blueline.

I don't give a shit where I play as long as I go number one in the draft and I sign the biggest contract I can. I've been busting my ass in this league for four years, and I'm gonna get what's coming to me.
Would you rather spread manure, or play hockey in Madison Square Garden in front of 20,000 people?
Spread manure.
You candy ass!
Wanna go, pretty boy?
Does little boom-boom have a crush on her?

[sarcastically]
Who? Miss McGill?
Fuck you.
She do it to me last year.
She do it to me last night.
